data.name: Bus Simulator 21 - Protect Nature Interior Pack
data.detailed_description:
When asked what spices up their lives, pedestrians, drivers, and passengers usually agree: variety!

With this "Protect Nature" themed, authentic bus interior pack, including four new, specifically designed color patterns for the seats and attractive floor designs, every virtual bus driver can make a statement about nature conservation.
Customize your bus and make it your own. Enjoy the freedom of choice and try something new.

The next shift is about to begin! So, what are you waiting for? Get in, sit down, and enjoy the fresh interior designs of your buses!

data.short_description: With this "Protect Nature" themed, authentic bus interior pack, including four new, specifically designed color patterns for the seats and attractive floor designs, every virtual bus driver can make a statement about nature conservation.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
